item.title: Curling Canada – ‘Johnny The Hammer Chow’
item.dc:creator: Kelsey
item.description:
Johnny ‘The Hammer’ Chow was a character created to exemplify the average club-curler lifestyle. This commercial series was very successful at getting ‘new curlers’ interested and involved in the sport.

The post Curling Canada – ‘Johnny The Hammer Chow’ appeared first on SwitchFrame Media.
item.content:encoded:
Johnny ‘The Hammer’ Chow was a character created to exemplify the average club-curler lifestyle. This commercial series was very successful at getting ‘new curlers’ interested and involved in the sport.

item.title: Rocks & Rings – Broadcast Campaigns
item.dc:creator: Kelsey
item.description:
See it on TSN during Season of Champions curling broadcasts or on our homepage at rocksandrings.com The program has reached over 1 Million kids. Does your school rock? For more information or to book Rocks & Rings at your child’s school, visit rocksandrings.com

item.title: Indie88 – ‘Music Inspires Us’
item.dc:creator: Kelsey
item.description:
Indie88 is Canada’s first online indie music station, providing a platform for emerging artists and a multi-media hub for news, local lifestyle, and pop-culture content focused on unique and engaging stories.

The post Indie88 – ‘Music Inspires Us’ appeared first on SwitchFrame Media.
item.content:encoded:
Indie88 is Canada’s first online indie music station, providing a platform for emerging artists and a multi-media hub for news, local lifestyle, and pop-culture content focused on unique and engaging stories.

item.title: Coleman – ‘1000 Reasons to Pitch a Tent’
item.dc:creator: Kelsey
item.description:
To promote their annual Tent event at Canadian Tire, Coleman wanted to show all the ways that we use Coleman tents.  Campgrounds, Mountains, Family outings… the list is endless!

The post Coleman – ‘1000 Reasons to Pitch a Tent’ appeared first on SwitchFrame Media.

item.title: Curling Canada – ‘Most Canadian Thing Ever’
item.dc:creator: Kelsey
item.description:
What’s more ‘Canadian’ than Curling?? There are more than 1000 curling facilities in Canada. Be a good Canadian and find one near you today!

The post Curling Canada – ‘Most Canadian Thing Ever’ appeared first on SwitchFrame Media.
